entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gretna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gretna 08:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -26.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -30.7°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
